Comment: Upgrades: Ruar (Unholy Armor,Improved Unholy Armor,Advanced Unholy Armor), Ubertip (Tooltip - Extended)
Value: Increases the armor of Ghouls, Crypt Fiends, Zombies, Skeletal Archers, Gargoyles, Abominations, Meat Wagons, Destroyers, Frost Wyrms, Obsidian Statues, Death Knights, Sapphiron, Risen Skeletons, and Anub'arak's Beetles.
